thread.title: BRIEF-East West Bancorp Reoprts Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share Of $1.13 Excluding Items

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-East West Bancorp Reoprts Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share Of $1.13 Excluding Items
text:
April 19 (Reuters) - East West Bancorp Inc:
* EAST WEST BANCORP REPORTS NET INCOME FOR FIRST QUARTER 2018 OF $187 MILLION AND DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE OF $1.28, BOTH UP BY 120% FROM THE PRIOR QUARTER
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.28 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.00 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.13 EXCLUDING ITEMS * NET INTEREST INCOME TOTALED $326.7 MILLION FOR Q1 OF 2018, AN INCREASE OF $7.0 MILLION, OR 2% LINKED QUARTER
* REAFFIRM OUR OUTLOOK FOR FULL YEAR 2018 * OUTLOOK FOR 2018 CURRENTLY ASSUMES TWO ADDITIONAL FED FUNDS RATE INCREASES IN 2018: IN JUNE AND SEPTEMBER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
